message.raw:
Added --significance option to aggregation, turning off significance
  plotting by default (since it is mathematically unsound).
Updated docs and usage with warnings of such.
Fixed bug that caused the average length display to screw up plotting.
  Average length was computed per group and component, but now is just per
  component.

message:
Added --significance option to aggregation, turning off significance
  plotting by default (since it is mathematically unsound).
Updated docs and usage with warnings of such.
Fixed bug that caused the average length display to screw up plotting.
  Average length was computed per group and component, but now is just per
  component.
